name: Oasis (itch) (melonbreadjin)
description:
Entry for Godot Wild Jam #35

Survive for 24 hours in an unknown desert with your trusty shovel. Use it to fend off enemies or to find treasures in a minesweeper-like gameplay. Be careful though, mobs will get stronger the more treasures you have. Hope you enjoy this prototype.

Controls: WASDDirectional Keys                                                                        
MouseAim
Left Mouse Button
AttackRight Mouse Button
DigFPick up treasure
SpaceDodge
Jam info:

Wildcard used:
- Tradeoff (Mobs get stronger if you pick up treasures)

Assets Used

All of these external assets are under CC BY-SA-4.0 License unless specified

- Great King Agadyrka by Spring/Spring Enterprises
- Desert Theme by CodeManu
- Desert Art(for the main menu background) by PWL (CC0)
